name: lifest_kill_10
text: You were no match for my master!
text_simple: you were no match for my master

name: lifest_kill_13
text: You feel the red hand of death.
text_simple: you feel the red hand of death
pretty_criteria: Killing a hero|A platinum hero chat wheel was used

name: lifest_kill_16
text: That is for the Master, there is no Master.
text_simple: that is for the master there is no master

name: lifest_kill_17
text: Your life, stolen right out from under you.
text_simple: your life stolen right out from under you

name: lifest_lasthit_03
text: I bite the hand that feeds me.
text_simple: i bite the hand that feeds me

name: lifest_lasthit_06
text: Keep your gold, I want your life.
text_simple: keep your gold i want your life

name: lifest_death_08
text: Leave me to rot in the open air.
text_simple: leave me to rot in the open air

name: lifest_death_09
text: Please don't put me in a box.
text_simple: please dont put me in a box

name: lifest_death_10
text: You're not the master of me.
text_simple: youre not the master of me

name: lifest_death_14
text: Better to die free then to live in chains.
text_simple: better to die free then to live in chains

name: lifest_fastres_01
text: You steal my life, I steal it back.
text_simple: you steal my life i steal it back

name: lifest_respawn_02
text: Unleashed once more upon the world.
text_simple: unleashed once more upon the world

name: lifest_respawn_07
text: Now where did I stash my loot?
text_simple: now where did i stash my loot

name: lifest_respawn_09
text: I'm sorry, Master, it won't happen again.
text_simple: im sorry master it wont happen again

name: lifest_respawn_11
text: Time to have a word with myself.
text_simple: time to have a word with myself

name: lifest_respawn_13
text: And who is the Master now?
text_simple: and who is the master now

name: lifest_rival_01
text: Batrider, come down to my level.
text_simple: batrider come down to my level

name: lifest_rival_02
text: Huskar, you give too much of yourself.
text_simple: huskar you give too much of yourself

name: lifest_rival_03
text: Try to heal your way out of that, Omniknight.
text_simple: try to heal your way out of that omniknight

name: lifest_rival_06
text: Pudge, so much life to steal.
text_simple: pudge so much life to steal

name: lifest_rival_07
text: Undying, you're a source of endless...amusement.
text_simple: undying youre a source of endless amusement

name: lifest_rival_08
text: Dirge, your life isn't worth a song.
text_simple: dirge your life isnt worth a song

name: lifest_rival_09
text: Oh, Puck, I wanted to tear your wings off while you were still alive!
text_simple: oh puck i wanted to tear your wings off while you were still alive

name: lifest_rival_10
text: Keep your mana, Anti-Mage. It's your life I want.
text_simple: keep your mana antimage its your life i want

name: lifest_rival_11
text: Oh Axe, so full of life: Delicious!
text_simple: oh axe so full of life delicious

name: lifest_rival_12
text: You had the right idea, Bloodseeker...but the wrong master.
text_simple: you had the right idea bloodseeker but the wrong master

name: lifest_rival_13
text: Death Prophet, you must have seen me coming.
text_simple: death prophet you must have seen me coming

name: lifest_rival_14
text: Nature's Prophet...bleh...your life tastes like sap!
text_simple: natures prophet bleh your life tastes like sap

name: lifest_rival_15
text: Tidehunter...I love a bit of raw fish now and again.
text_simple: tidehunter i love a bit of raw fish now and again

name: lifest_rival_16
text: Lich, stealing your life gave me an ice headache!
text_simple: lich stealing your life gave me an ice headache

name: lifest_rival_17
text: Next time, Shadow Fiend, leave a little juice in those souls.
text_simple: next time shadow fiend leave a little juice in those souls

name: lifest_rival_18
text: Mmm, Queen of Pain... so succulent.
text_simple: mmm queen of pain so succulent

name: lifest_rival_20
text: Tiny indeed... your life is crushing me!
text_simple: tiny indeed your life is crushing me

name: lifest_rival_22
text: I steal your life...someone else already stole your face.
text_simple: i steal your life someone else already stole your face

name: lifest_purch_01
text: Even a thief must sometimes pay the asking price.
text_simple: even a thief must sometimes pay the asking price

name: lifest_purch_02
text: It pains me to purchase what ought to be stolen.
text_simple: it pains me to purchase what ought to be stolen

name: lifest_purch_03
text: So this is what gold is for?
text_simple: so this is what gold is for

text: I don't need to buy my lifesteal!

text: I sense the presence of Vladmir!

name: lifest_lose_03
text: No! Don't put me back in my cage.
text_simple: no dont put me back in my cage

name: lifest_regen_02
text: It still won't stop me from stealing.
text_simple: it still wont stop me from stealing

text: I am compelled to thank you.
